abstract: 20th Century Fox moved to shore up its movie marketing operation on Tuesday, naming Oren Aviv, a former top executive at Walt Disney Studios, to the position of chief marketing officer.
snippet: 20th Century Fox moved to shore up its movie marketing operation on Tuesday, naming Oren Aviv, a former top executive at Walt Disney Studios, to the position of chief marketing officer.
lead_paragraph: To shore up its movie marketing operation, 20th Century Fox on Tuesday named Oren Aviv, a former top executive at Walt Disney Studios, to the position of chief marketing officer.

headline.main: 20th Century Fox Names Ex-Disney Exec as Marketing Chief
